mapper.select: SELECT a.equipment_number,b.product_name,w.*,d.salesman_name,a.sell_time FROM `emdb_equipment` a JOIN `emdb_product` b ON a.product_id=b.product_id INNER JOIN `emdb_equipment_erro` w ON a.equipment_id=w.equipment_id JOIN `emdb_salesman` d ON a.salesman_id=d.salesman_id where a.company_id = #{company_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT COUNT(erro_id) as value,company_local_city as name FROM ( SELECT c.company_id,c.company_local_city,e.equipment_id,erro.erro_id FROM emdb_company c JOIN emdb_equipment e ON c.company_id=e.company_id INNER JOIN emdb_equipment_erro erro ON erro.equipment_id=e.equipment_id) d GROUP BY company_local_city;
